title: Large-Scale Analysis and Practice of AI-Based Mathematics Education Effectiveness

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic mathematical concepts (functions, statistics) and awareness of fundamental AI terminology
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning environment with simple app utilization for project deliverables submission

learning_goals: They achieve a 20% improvement in mathematical problem-solving efficiency by analyzing AI educational tool applications.

Learners write a 5-page comparative report (introduction-methods-results-discussion) analyzing cognitive (knowledge acquisition) and affective (satisfaction) learning outcomes by referencing 3+ meta-analysis studies.

Within a week, learners complete a math modeling project on a real-world problem (e.g., traffic flow optimization, energy consumption prediction) using Python-based AI tools (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch). They submit project outputs (code, report, demo video) and achieve a "B+"+ grade in 4 of 5 rubric criteria: problem definition clarity, model suitability, and feasibility.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
